…nationwide. The 28  programs, soon to be 29 with the addition of the Mississippi Sound, and  partnerships will work hard to address challenges we are all familiar  with, like harmful algal blooms, coastal erosion, and runoff pollution.

Keeping our estuaries healthy means keeping our coastal communities  strong. Estuaries protect these communities from flooding,…
